title: I, Beauty
description: Beauty is a sultry Geechee gal born and raised in Charleston. Since the tender age of 14, she believed her true love Caleb, was all that was required for a perfect future. Now at the age of 29, all that theyâ€™ve built in their life together is jeopardized as she learns of a life full of secrets that end in heartbreak, betrayal, and murder. When some unlikely strangers present her with an opportunity for revenge, Beauty forgets her moral compass. After realizing her thirst for revenge may cost her all that she has left, Beauty must choose between all that she was and all that she can become.
author: Lashone Vs Shaneek
